body.name: KODAK FLIK HD9 Smart Projector | Mini Black Portable Indoor & Outdoor Movie with Android TV Streaming Apps, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, Built-In Speakers & Voice Remote | FHD 1080p for Screens Up to 120”
deliveryMessages: Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 55 mins
features: MOBILE PROJECTOR FOR OUTDOOR MOVIE NIGHT | Supersize Your Favorite Movies, Streaming TV & Other Entertainment with the FLIK HD9 Smart Projector! Despite its Conveniently Small Styling, This Android-TV Powered Video Projector Delivers Stunning Big Screen Results, Displaying Full HD Images Up to 120” for Backyard Movie Night, Gaming Parties, & Other Indoor & Outdoor Large-Scale Viewing | Sets Up in Seconds with Included Smart Projector, Google Assistant Voice Remote, AC Adapter, Power Cord

WATCH NETFLIX & OTHER APPS ON ANDROID TV | Use the Easy Android TV Interface to Browse Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu, YouTube TV & Other Popular Streaming Services for Infinite Viewing Over Wi-Fi Including the Latest Movies, Television, Live Sports & News | FLIK Also Lets You Mirror Content from an iOS or Android Device Over Airplay/Chromecast; Pair with Wireless Headphones, Speakers or Gaming Controllers Via Bluetooth; Plug Into Xbox One, PS5 or Laptop Via HDMI; or Connect a USB or Flash Drive

GORGEOUS IMAGING EVERYWHERE YOU WATCH | Full HD 1080p Native Resolution Delivers Impressive Image Quality for Today’s Most Demanding 4K Video Content with Brilliant, True-to-Life Crisp Color, Contrast Ratio, 16:9 Aspect Ratio & 200 ANSI Lumens Brightness for Dim to Dark Viewing Environments | Simple Manual Focus Wheel & Automatic Keystone Correction Eliminate Blur, Tilt & Ensure Perfect Projection from Any Angle | Excellent Choice for Kids Bedroom, Business Meetings, Watch Parties & So Much More

LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT FOR PORTABLE PLAY | Take the Fun to Go! As Long as You Have a Power Outlet, Wi-Fi Connection, Projector Screen & Stand [or Wall], This Pint-Sized Wonder Transforms Any Space into an Immersive Movie Theater | Dual 3-Watt Speakers are Built Right Into the Projector, So You Can Wow an Audience Anywhere—No Complicated Setup Needed | Shaped Like a Cube, the HD9 Also Fits in the Palm of Your Hand, Weighs Next to Nothing & Comes with a Comfortable Carry Strap for Grab-and-Go Ease

SMALLER, FASTER & SMARTER THAN THE REST | It’s All You Need to Entertain! Exceptional Imaging, Lightning-Fast Bluetooth 5.0, Seamless Wi-Fi & Wide Compatibility Make FLIK HD9 an Ideal Choice for All Kinds of Personal & Professional Applications Such as Home Movie Nights, Conventions, Office Meetings, School Assemblies, Retail Demonstrations & Business Conferences | Give an Exciting Gift for Children, Adults in Need of Streaming Options, or Anyone Who Wants to Cut the Cable Cord in a Big Way!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page For your Viewing Pleasure Select from four different projection modes the projector positioning that best suits your needs. Save your Screen Choose a screensaver video and adjust other screensaver settings for when your projector is idle. A Closeup on Quality Resize your projected screen without going through the hassle of moving around the projector. Wireless Back and Forth Connect an external device via Bluetooth and control it with this innovative projector. Dust-free Optimization Dust-guarded construction maintains image brightness and picture quality for a long lifespan. Next page 1 Projection Modes 2 Screensaver 3 Zoom In/Out 4 Dual-way Bluetooth 5 Dustproof Design

Previous page All-in-one Entertainment Find binge-worthy content from popular streaming services on this Android TV-powered projector. From One Screen to the Next Cast your favorite movies or TV shows from your phone or tablet right on the big screen. Put on Full Display See everything in high clarity when you display images on a 16:9 screen that projects up to 120”. By your Command Ask questions, find content and navigate easily with Google Assistant on your voice-operated remote. Get the Perfect Angle Get the Perfect Angle Auto keystone correction technology eliminates distortion, delivering the best viewing experience. Next page 1 Android TV 2 Screen Mirroring 3 Widescreen 4 Google Assistant 5 Auto Keystone Correction

What makes the KODAK FLIK HD9 unique? a. This all-in-one projector is perfect for movie night, game night, and other cinematic experiences. It stands out for its dustproof design, Android TV-powered interface, voice-controlled remote, and more. Does this projector support wired devices? The KODAK FLIK HD9 smart projector comes with built-in USB, AUX, and HDMI inputs. With these inputs, this projector is compatible with USB drives, computers, headphones, gaming consoles, and more. How is the audio quality of this projector? The dual 3 W speakers make you feel the impact of the sound being played. In addition, the dual-way Bluetooth feature allows you to connect external Bluetooth speakers for louder sound or connect headphones for private listening. Can this projector be used for outdoor movie nights? Yes, this projector was designed to be compact and lightweight to easily take with you anywhere, even outdoors. Enjoy a movie night under the night sky with a projector that can project a screen up to 120”. What apps does this smart projector support? This projector uses an Android TV interface and comes with tons of built-in apps. You can enjoy some of your favorite movies and TV shows with this projector from popular streaming services like Netflix and Amazon Prime Video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I love how great the quality of the image the projector provides as well as the ease of setup and use. The remote control is very simple and easy to use. You can also expand the parameter of the image as needed without too much distortion which comes in handy if you have a larger surface to watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids Love it!!
reviews.reviewText: All summer it made movie night great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Preloaded Google TV Playback Issues
reviews.reviewText: The projector itself is fine, but the Google TV software which is Hako Mini OS does not work in comparison to other streaming devices. YouTubeTV especially stutters and buffers constantly. I have a robust internet network with various streaming devices and no issues like this. I connected a Chromecast device to the projector HDMI input, and that works just fine for the image, but you can’t connect an external speaker via Bluetooth via the HDMI port, which became a dealbreaker for me. If you want to use just the projector, that’s fine, but any of the other bells and whistles aren’t effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Purchase a different projector
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this projector because I thought the speaker on it would be loud enough. Unfortunately, the speaker quality was as low as those mini projectors on Temu... I also want to add that having to reconnect the remote to the projector each time it is turned off is very annoying. I will likely be returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Built in android tv but built in battery would have made this perfect
reviews.reviewText: This little projector is an ALMOST perfect portable theater on the go. With an ANSI 200 Lumen brightness rating it's not the brightest but it comes with built in AndroidTV and any streaming app you would want. The handle on top makes it super cute and portable so you would expect to just be able to grab it and tether it to your mobile phone and play movies on a wall out behind your dorm. The one missing feature to make that dream a reality is the lack of a rechargeable battery built in. You can grab it and go but you better bring that 50' extension cord with you and find a plug nearby. So close to a really really cool grab and go projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight with clear picture output
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use during our casual family gatherings. This is a lightweight and portable projector. Very easy to setup and picture quality is good. It is not the most powerful projector so works best if the room is dark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Slow Hardware + Bad Picture
reviews.reviewText: I’ve got to try out five projectors in the last three years and this has been the only failed purchase. Software runs slow, freezes constantly. And the picture quality is worse than projectors half the price. I thought buying a name brand would be a major upgrade. Was wrong!
